attributes.action: Electric car charging points should be more common across the UK
attributes.additional_details: I would like you to act on this because me, my dad and my sister have an electric car and we were stranded multiple times because of the issue of there not being enough charge points. I received a letter about the government already spending large amounts on charge points but I feel the letter I wrote to them about this subject was not taken seriously enough and no action was taken.
attributes.background: I would like car charging points to be more accessible by both making personal car chargers less expensive and by more car parks having public charge points.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the cost of electric vehicle chargers, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Set up a national Electric Vehicle (EV) charging network in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614529
